issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://online.cosmosbank.in/RetailCorporate/#/login/retailcorporate](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonline.cosmosbank.in%2FRetailCorporate%2F%23%2Flogin%2Fretailcorporate) ### Comment Username: @chintan124 > 1. URL that i am trying to access : https://online.cosmosbank.in/RetailCorporate/#/login/retailcorporate > The Problem : This page is NOT getting loaded only on Adguard DNS. > Solutions that i have tried which have not worked : > 1. disable all blocklists on my adguard private dns server > 2. whitelist this particular domain (cosmosbank.com, cosmosbank.in, cosmosbank.co.in) on my adguard private dns server > 2. www.cosmosbank.com Main homepage. then Click on "Netbanking Login" > 3. Opening this page fails when I am using Adguard DNS --- Screenshot attached > 4. This page loads when I connect to Any VPN not using Adguard DNS (Private) or even Google DNS (8.8.8.8). A screenshot of this same page loaded using Surfshark VPN or Google DNS is attached ### Screenshots

Niestety w Operze nie da się zainstalować certyfikatu AdGuarda, przez co filtrowanie nie działa na stronach HTTPS.
Ten komunikat powoduje filtrowania DNS i w przypadku Opery, prawdopodobnie bez odblokowania reklam nie da się z tym nic zrobić.
W przeglądarce Chrome/Firefox tego problemu nie ma.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, at the moment the type of rule used to block these ads is not working as expected. This problem is addressed in the repository noted above. As a temporary solution that removes ads from slides, you can add this rule:
```javascript
nivod5.tv,nivod4.tv#%#(function(){window.eval=new Proxy(eval,{apply:(e,c,n)=>{const o=Reflect.apply(e,c,n);if("object"==typeof o&&o.banners)try{o.banners.forEach(((e,c)=>{e.commercial&&(e.commercial={})}))}catch(e){console.debug(e)}return o}})})();
```

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://akhbarelyom.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fakhbarelyom.com%2F) ### Comment > Currently, Liste FR is recommended in addition to Liste AR for Arabic websites. However, I consider this ridiculous. As you know, Chrome MV3 will be introduced soon and I don't want to add more filters. Liste FR is a huge filter, but most of them are useless for Arabic websites. I found only one useful case. So, is there any way to deal with this site other than Liste FR? ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Hmm. It seems filtering is applied. Not sure if 100% of time... Still cannot reproduce.
Have you ever noticed a protection being interrupted? You can observe this by turning on the legacy Assistant (in AdGuard settings => Extensions ), and opening different sites. If it is not displayed - most likely filtering has been interrupted (completely or partially).

comment.body:
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/1d9c6bb5-636b-4cff-b9be-c9f90993d3f1)

Cannot reproduce.
Please check advanced settings of AdGuard for Windows and that AhnLab V3 is installed.

AhnLab V3 anti-virus and online banking security app of South Korea can interfere behavior of AdGuard WPF network driver.
Therefore, Please remove AhnLab V3 anti-virus or online banking security app of South Korea.
If you need a help, please email filters@adguard.com.

<details><summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

재구현 할 수 없습니다.
AdGuard의 고급 설정과 안랩 V3가 설치되어 있는지 확인해주세요.

안랩 V3 안티-바이러스와 온라인 뱅킹 보안 프로그램은 AdGuard WPF 네트워크 드라이버의 행동을 방해할 수 있습니다.
따라서, 안랩 V3 안티-바이러스와 온라인 뱅킹 보안 프로그램을 제거해주세요.
만약 도움이 필요하시면, filters@adguard.com 으로 이메일을 남겨주세요.

</details> 

Ref: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1760

It blocks all ads on the internet without adding any extra filters. I installed it on my windowsI've been using adguard home on my cloud server for a long time. It blocks all ads on the internet without adding any extra filters. I installed it on my windows computer today. I filtered using the addresses 127.0.0.1 and 192.168.1.24. Ads are blocked on many sites. but youtube and twitch ads are not blocked as in the cloud server. What is the difference between cloud server and windows computer? Isn't it possible for me to block all ads like in the cloud? computer today. I filtered using the addresses 127.0.0.1 and 192.168.1.24. oduct_store_id%3D%26ds_url_v%3D2%26ds_dest_url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252F8808.xg4ken.com%252Ftrk%252Fv1%253Fprof%253D413%26camp%3D8221%26kct%3Dgoogle%26kchid%3D2704723172%26criteriaid%3Dpla-2054630044774%26campaignid%3D12455790129%26locphy%3D9027306%26adgroupid%3D118077110763%26adpos%3D%26cid%3D503118727086%26networkType%3D%26kdv%3Dm%26kext%3D%26kadtype%3D%26kmc%3D8740%26kpid%3D324764220%26url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.homedepot.com%252Fp%252FRYOBI-ONE-HP-18V-Brushless-Edger-Tool-Only-P2302BTL%252F324764220%253Fg_store%253D%26source%3Dshoppingads%26locale%3Den-US%26mtc%3DSHOPPING-BF-CDP-GGL-D28I-028_032_PORTABLE-NA-NA-NA-SMART-NA-NA-NA-NA-NBR-NA-NA-NA-SMART_SHP%26cm_mmc%3DSHOPPING-BF-CDP-GGL-D28I-028_032_PORTABLE-NA-NA-NA-SMART-NA-NA-NA-NA-NBR-NA-NA-NA-SMART_SHP-71700000080837630-58700006820161822-92700076368169372%26gclsrc%3Daw.ds%26gbraid%3D0AAAAADq61Uc79Oc4n0l_QhX9QZ8w4e__b%26gclid%3DCjwKCAjws7WkBhBFEiwAIi1686cEKR5F--Ul-R6RdNI51J0sBm5PNhdR1Zc7Jlv8-nlXXWahYS6qThoCBKoQAvD_BwE) ### Comment > Whenever, Ad Guard is enabled, whenever I’m searching Google for any specific product and the product appears as a “sponsored” ad, 90% of the time whenever I click on the product that I’m actually trying to find it will not allow me to open the page unless I disable AdGuard and then click it. > > I have attempted to add several variations of the add double click URL to the allow list, but never works. A quick Google search keeps leading me to how to enable AB blocking for other issues, but not how to allow meI have attempted to add several variations of the “ad.double click.” URL to the allow list, but never works. Also the other blocked url “https://clickserve.dartsearch.net”, still no success. > A quick Google search keeps leading me to how to ENABLE Adblocking for other issues, but not how to allow or (disable whatever filter that’s preventing my google search from opening the product I’m trying to locate). > > This issue isn’t isolated to home depot (or links that open other apps), pretty much any product I search for… which typically is successful in appearing in the first few of the “sponsored“ Google ads.. unless I go and disable AdGuard as a whole, I can’t actually go to the freaking page. I am specifically attempting to go to. > If there’s any assistance that somebody’s found, please let me know. Thank you for the time. ### Screenshots

Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/gAemXzI.jpg)

AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList Other extensions used: | Tried disabling, safari pop-up blocker that’s built-in to the phone browser. The only way I can get a product that I’m searching via Google is to actually turn off Ad Guard mobile.

list, but never works. A quick Google search keeps leading me to how to enable AB blocking for other issues, but not how to allow meI have attempted to add several variations of the “ad.double click.” URL to the allow list, but never works. Also the other blocked url “https://clickserve.dartsearch.net”, still no success. > A quick Google search keeps leading me to how to ENABLE Adblocking for other issues, but not how to allow or (disable whatever filter that’s preventing my google search from opening the product I’m trying to locate). > > This issue isn’t isolated to home depot (or links that open other apps), pretty much any product I search for… which typically is successful in appearing in the first few of the “sponsored“ Google ads.. unless I go and disable AdGuard as a whole, I can’t actually go to the freaking page. I am specifically attempting to go to. > If there’s any assistance that somebody’s found, please let me know. Thank you for the time. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Checked this link - it is not blocked on my devise with the same settings.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.
